document_data.name: Sparkle
document_data.mainbody: '''Sparkle''' was a [[cat|housecat]] owned by [[Ravens Bluff]] resident [[Bevis Roland]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: At some point, the older brother of Sparkle's owner—[[Russell Roland]], a member of the city's [[Council of Lords (Ravens Bluff)|Council of Lords]]—spread a rumor throughout Ravens Bluff with the help of the [[magic-user]] [[Grimalkin (person)|Grimalkin the Sage]] that claimed the housecat was actually a [[basilisk]] that had been ''[[polymorph]]ed''. Russell's motivation for spreading this rumor was a desire to discourage strangers from bothering his young sister.
